name: ROG Zephyrus G16 (2025) GU605
description: The ROG Zephyrus G16 (2025) GU605 is a premium 16" gaming and creator laptop featuring an Intel Core Ultra 9 CPU, up to RTX 5090 GPU, and a stunning 2.5K OLED 240Hz display. It’s ultra-slim, lightweight (~1.85 kg), and packed with AI features, high-speed memory (up to 64 GB LPDDR5X), and advanced cooling. Ideal for performance-demanding users who want power and portability in one sleek package.
